synonyms: sanaka-ādi—the four Kumāras; nārada—Nārada; pṛthu—Mahārāja Pṛthu; paraśurāma—Paraśurāma; jīva-rūpa—as the living entity; brahmāra—of Lord Brahmā; āveśa-avatāra-nāma—all of them are called empowered incarnations.
translation: "Some śaktyāveśa-avatāras are the four Kumāras, Nārada, Mahārāja Pṛthu and Paraśurāma. When a living being is empowered to act as Lord Brahmā, he is also considered a śaktyāveśa-avatāra.
